on reading compounds: 兆【チョウ】10^12, 1,000,000,000,000, trillion, sign, omen, indication, portent
兆候【チョウコウ】sign, indication, omen, symptom
吉兆【キッチョウ】lucky omen, good omen
慶兆【ケイチョウ】sign of happiness, good omen
kun reading compounds: 兆す【きざす】to show signs, to have symptoms, to give indications (of), to bud, to germinate, to sprout
